summary: Core Ask Big Sister app flow (II auth gate, Home/Ask/About navigation, question list + detail, anonymous option UI, warm theme, moderator answer form) appears implemented, but some key requirements are incomplete: questions lack title/details separation, answers are limited to a single answer per question, and anonymous questions do not retain author principal for audit as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Users can submit a new question with a title and details.
missing_requirements.reason: The frontend and backend only handle a single `text` field for questions; no separate title+details fields are shown in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend supports creating and storing one or more answers per question, including author principal and timestamp.
missing_requirements.reason: The backend data model stores only a single optional `answer` and explicitly blocks answering an already answered question, preventing multiple answers per question.
evidence: backend/main.mo (Question has `answer : ?Answer`; `if (question.isAnswered) { trap("Question has already been answered") }`)

missing_requirements.requirement: The backend still stores the author principal for moderation/audit, but the UI respects anonymity settings.
missing_requirements.reason: When `isAnonymous` is true, the backend sets `author = null`, meaning the author principal is not stored at all.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile setup and profile storage (prompting users for a name/displayName) as a mandatory post-login step.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request user profiles or a profile setup flow; it only requires II auth and Q&A functionality.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (forces ProfileSetupDialog when profile is null)

hallucinated_features.description: Admin-token based access-control initialization via a secret URL parameter (`caffeineAdminToken`).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest specifies moderator-only answering but does not request a URL-parameter secret token mechanism for admin/moderator role assignment.

hallucinated_features.description: Caffeine.ai attribution footer with UTM tracking link.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of requested requirements or constraints.
